name: adm2
description: Second level administrative subdivision (within the first level subdivision)

name: adm3
description: Third level administrative subdivision (within the second level subdivision)

name: adm4
description: Fourth level administrative subdivision (within the third level subdivision)

name: adm5
description: Fifth level administrative subdivision (within the fourth level subdivision)

name: location
description: Name of the location where the location was made. E.g., a place name or locality description.

name: site
description: Name of the sub-location where the observation was made

name: trial_id
description: Identifier of a single trial (that may have treatments and replicates); should be unique within dataset_id

name: reference
description: Reference to source if the data set is a compilation

name: longitude
description: Longitude of the location where the observation was made (in decimal notation)

name: latitude
description: Latitude of the location where the observation was made (in decimal notation)

name: start_date
description: Experiment start (planting) date in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format

name: end_date
description: Experiment end (harvest) date in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format

name: on_farm
description: Is this observation on farm (not on station)

name: is_survey
description: Is this observation from a survey (not an experiment)

name: rep
description: Replication number (1, 2, 3, ...) For this specific observation

name: intercrops
description: Other crop grown together with the main crop

name: previous_crop
description: Crop grown on this plot in the prior season

name: crop_rotation
description: Crops grown in rotation on this plot

name: observation_date
notes: For experiments with, e.g. intermediate crop cuts; or for surveys

name: biomass_roots
description: Dry-weight biomass of fine roots per unit area

name: biomass_stems
description: Dry-weight biomass of stems per unit area

name: biomass_leaves
description: Dry-weight biomass of leaves per unit area

name: biomass_storage
description: Dry-weight biomass of storage organs per unit area

name: biomass_total
description: Dry-weight total biomass per unit area

name: yield
description: Fresh weight biomass of the main harvestable parts at maturity, per unit area

name: residue_yield
description: Fresh weight biomass of the above ground biomass except for the harvestable parts at maturity, per unit area

name: N_splits
description: Number of splits in the N_fertilizer application

name: P_fertilizer
description: P applied in inorganic fertilizer (as P, not P2O5)

name: K_fertilizer
description: K applied in inorganic fertilizer (as K, not K2O)

name: rain
description: Total rainfall between planting and harvest

name: rAUDPC
description: Area under the disease progress curve divided by the non-diseased season length
